title: My Google pixel 2 is the worst phone ever HELP
content:
1. Most of the time phone calls don't have audio. 

2. my phone won't put out audio all together

3. The battery dies even though my phone claims to be at 25-45%


To fix #1 and #2 I would turn my phone off and then as I turn it back on while holding all of the buttons until the screen turned off but that doesn't work anymore

The battery part could be because I bought it refurbished  but #1and #2 I've fixed without moving my phone.

I HAVE HAD THESE ISSUES EVEN AFTER FACTORY RESETTING AND NOT RESTORING A BACKUP OR EVEN INSTALLING ANY APPS
